short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to format and search JSON data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Key Features:

📝 Easy JSON Formatting: Paste your JSON and instantly see a neatly formatted version, with auto-detected validity and color-coded messages.

🔍 Dynamic Search: Quickly search for key-value pairs or paths in JSON data, with results highlighted and structured for easy viewing.

🖱️ Interactive UI: Switch between formatting and search tabs seamlessly, with a user-friendly interface.

📋 Copy to Clipboard: Easily copy formatted JSON with a single click and visual confirmation.

🧹 Clear Input: Start fresh anytime with the "Clear" button to quickly reset your input.

⚡ Real-time Feedback: Get instant validation as you paste or edit JSON, with errors highlighted for easy correction.
